title: Fernando Cuéllar (footballer)
text:
Fernando Cuéllar Ávalos (August 27, 1945 – November 5, 2008) was a Peruvian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player.
Club career.
He was a defender and mainly played in <a href="Universitario%20de%20Deportes">Universitario de Deportes</a> in the 1970s.
International career.
Cuéllar made nine appearances for the senior <a href="Peru%20national%20football%20team">Peru national football team</a> from 1971 to 1975.
Career as manager.
Cuéllar was also a successful trainer, leading San Agustin (a very small club from Lima) to win the Peruvian Championship (called "Descentralizado"). He repeated that success with Universitario de Deportes in 1990.
Personal.
Cuéllar died 5 November 2008 in Lima.
